nodes.bodyText: Does this successfully override the Ctrl + D "bookmark this page" shortcut (Windows) and/or our own Delete Line shortcut? (wondering if this should be a rebindable "Send EOF to Console" command)

It does, although if the user has explicitly defined their own Ctrl + D shortcut it will override this usage. (IIUC this is because the shortcut manager handles shortcuts in the capture phase rather than the bubble phase, whereas key handlers here get registered in the bubble phase)
